moves.1. e4: I always start off with this move.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4: My favorite opening. The Scottish defence!
moves.3... exd4 4. Nxd4 Bc5 5. Nxc6 bxc6: Hmm... I think it's better to play Qf6 and then dxc6.
moves.7... d6 8. Nc3 Ne7 9. h3 O-O 10. Bd2 d5: A mistake! You'll see how to win by this move.
moves.11. exd5 cxd5 12. Nxd5: A surprising move, but very good and effective.
moves.14... Bb6 15. Qxa8: And a total loss for black.Thanks you for watching this game.
